title: Fixing Python
description:
**Audience level**

Intermediate

**Description**

Discover a bug in a standard Python library, provide a reproducible test
case, log a bug report with the Python maintainers, prepare & submit a
patch. Get patch accepted into 2.x & 3.x master.

**Abstract**

This talk will provide a real-world walk-through of how to discover a
bug in Python, prepare a reproducible test case and log a bug report. It
will then continue to show on how to provide a patch and get it accepted
and deployed into Python 2.7.7 and 3.4.1

**Slides**

https://speakerdeck.com/nzpug/teijo-holzer-fixing-python
